detailedDescription: Proposed prestige two-storey office development within Windsor Town Centre with an approximate floor area of 20,000 sq ft (1,858 sq. m). Windsor & Eton Central and Riverside rail stations are a short walk providing excellent access to London (via the Elizabeth line and Waterloo) along with access to the West (Reading and the South West). Windsor has excellent road communications with Junction 6 of the M4 being a 5-minute drive which provides links to the M25 London orbital Motorway and the rest of the nations network.
